As someone who used to play this game every single day, I must say that for me it truly felt unriveled in the fps genre.  These days, however, the game has been going consistently downhill. It has many problems and it seems like valve just doesn't care. Dont get wrong, the game is pretty good in its core, some things just need to be changed or in some cases entirely reworked. Some of them that come off the top of my head are the ranked system (I think it needs  a total revamp), cheating, griefing and toxicity are also major problems. Also, maybe some new gamemodes or minigames that can freshen up the gameplay a bit. I think they can take many ideas form other games and system in order to improve. Until then, however,[b] I wouldn't recommend the game to a newcomer.[/b]
